profile.describe: Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department (LVMPD) Deva is a prototype model managing the Indra.ai Law Enforcement Framework that is not yet offocially supported or sanctioned by the Federal Law Enforcement Community. But is a Prototype Model intended to show lawful non-weaponized features the Indra.ai Law Enforcement Framwork could provide the United States Federal Law Enforcement Community in crime detection, prevention, remediation, and in supporting Constitution of the United States of Americaü§ùü´°üëÆüá∫üá∏.
